ME: What position are you applying for?

ASIDE: I am applying for a position as a music producer at a recording studio. I believe my education and industry experience make me a strong candidate for this role
ME: Please think about it carefully. Has the recruiter been informed about your availability? Please answer yes or no.

message.content:
ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about my availability yet. ASIDE: I will make sure to bring up my availability later in the conversation. I want to make sure the recruiter knows that I can start working as soon as possible.

RECRUITER: How soon are you available to start working?

ANSWER: I am available to start working as soon as possible. I am eager to join the team
